Title: Establishes the crimes of carjacking in first, second and third degrees
Summary: Establishes the crimes of carjacking in first, second and third degrees, as the stealing of a motor vehicle from a person or presence of another person through the use or threatened use of force; increases penalties for causing injury to such victim, displaying a real or fake gun or using such a weapon; provides that all carjackings are violent felony offenses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to carjacking
